overview: Mahmoud Lorry driver makes a trip from Luxor to Tanta over two days. During his journey along the road, Khalil, who fled from the cruelty of his father's wife, goes with him to go to his mother in Tanta. He also takes with him in the Lori a greeting to bring her to a friend. During their three journeys, they face many problems that hinder their journey, including the arrest of political leaflets and the pursuit of a drug gang to retrieve a drug shipment on board the Lorry.
title: Three on the Road
